sentence.text: Even in that scant garment he was very hot and sweaty .
In the May heatwave my feet were considerably cooler and less sweaty than they would have been in leather boots .
My two chips were ready in my sweaty palm .
He is sweaty and sparkling .
Hutton wiped his face , which was pale and sweaty .
I wiped my brow , which had become a little sweaty , and took a last look up at the shadowless wall above .
To reinforce it , several miners crammed into the little wooden hut with Verdeţ , adding the odour of their own sweaty bodies to the air of tension .
The Prince mopped his brow , his hands sweaty inside his gloves , as he faced the bowling for the new over .
My opponent drew off his mask and I gazed into the red , sweaty face of the king .
` Time for a shower ? " he asked , wiping his brow with the back of one sweaty hand .
Grossman shifted the telephone uneasily from one hand to the other and wiped his sweaty palm , but the conversation was proving equally uncomfortable no matter which ear he listened with .
Robyn opened her mouth , but before she could put it to the test he clamped a hot sweaty palm over her lips .
It was the place where we had to display our knobbly knees and pimply backs , our sometimes not very clean underwear and our sweaty socks .
It looks as though sweaty locker rooms will be a thing of the past as Swedish scientists have developed a smell-absorbing paint .
Twice a month the fat lawyer whom I think of as the Agent comes to visit in his sweaty suit .
Sweaty men with hard eyes spun the girls round .
The boots served me well in wet weather doing an admirable job in keeping my feet dry , but on some of the hotter days this year I did find that my feet got unpleasantly hot and sweaty .
Well it may have been a grunt of irritation that his lovely hire-car was steaming up with two sweaty , stinking hill-walkers who had forced their way in uninvited , but I prefer to think disbelief .
He jogged on the beach , swarthy and sweaty , bumping into the locals , including Peter Weir .
` I 'm hot , sweaty , tired , and I 'm going to take a shower , " was the careless retort .
She grew hot and pink-faced and sweaty .
Babies , sweaty and overheated , were whining and fractious .
Maxim woke slowly , sweaty and dry-mouthed and with no idea of what day or time it was .
This question about how often you exercise and get sweaty is ridiculous .
